item.title: Feature Engineering with Stepwise Regression
item.description: When I was studying statistics, I noticed an algorithm called “stepwise regression”. Generally, this is a method that ranks features based on their importances and finds out how important each feature is to the prediction. The following coding will show the process of finding the features importances. (Assumed that this is a binary classification) Import the tools import pandas as pd from sklearn.preprocessing import MinMaxScaler from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder from

item.title: Creating my Website
item.description: I want a website I wanted to have my own personal website for a long time. I have tried to create a website many times. I tried to have my own website on 000webhostapp, hostinger and gihub with HTML and CSS, but these designs are usually so simple and unsatisfactory for me. Now I really want to build a new one! I am building this website with Hugo. This is
